General.Name: Property Franchise Group PLC
General.Description: The Property Franchise Group PLC manages residential real estate properties in the United Kingdom. It operates through two segments, Property Franchising and Financial Services. The company provides residential letting, estate agency, sales, and property management services to tenants and landlords; and financial services, as well as operates as property franchisor. It also engages in property investment. It offers its services under the CJ Hole, Ellis & Co, EweMove, Martin & Co, Parkers, and Whitegates, as well as the Mortgage Genie brands. The company was formerly known as MartinCo PLC and changed its name to The Property Franchise Group PLC in March 2017. The Property Franchise Group PLC was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Bournemouth, the United Kingdom.
